title: Apple holding limited WWDC 2022 keynote viewing at Apple Park for developers and students
content:
Along with Apple announcing dates and details for WWDC 2022 which will be all online, there will be a special in-person event for developers and students at Apple Park on June 6 this year to experience the keynote and more.

more…
